Key Match Events: India beat England by 68 runs in the 2nd Semi-Final of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup, 2024
Pre-Game Insights: In their last five head-to-head encounters, India dominated in three matches while England won two games.
The team winning the toss may decide to bat or bowl based on the ground conditions.
The venue is suited for both pacers and spinners alike.
There is light rain expected which may affect playing conditions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The average first-innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 150 runs.
